text: Bigu (ej Pajomʙar ʙaroi inho musrikon): «Hamono Parvardigori man, zistkorihoro (gunohoni kaʙiraro), ci oskor ʙosand ʙo ʙadan va ci pinhon dar dil az kiʙru xudnamoi va niz zulmu az had guzaronii nohaqro harom kardaast va niz harom kardaast, cizero sariki Alloh sozed, ki hec dalele ʙar sarik ovardani on nozil nasudaast jo dar ʙorai Alloh (dar nomho va sifathojas) cizhoe ʙigued, ki namedoned
